item.title: (VIDEO) Ancient Blooming Tea
item.itunes:author: Michael Kiely
item.description: I recently came across some bizarre tea called Blooming Display Tea that has a very strange and ancient brewing process. It has to be seen to be believed, so I made this little video demonstration to show you. This cool tea is made up of tea leaves that are hand-wrapped, tightly packed and dried into a little tea ball. When steeped in hot water, the tea ball slowly unfurls its leaves into a magical blossoming flower right before your eyes. Its the perfect tea to serve when entertaining guests or for fun when you're bored like I was. Stuff Featured in the Video: Blooming Display Teas http://www.thegreenhead.com/2006/01/adagio-teas-blooming-display-teas.php The Ultimate Coffee Cup http://www.thegreenhead.com/2007/06/ultimate-coffee-cup-by-david-pier.php Zojirushi VE Hybrid - Stainless Steel Water Boiler http://www.thegreenhead.com/2008/11/zojirushi-ve-hybrid-stainless-steel-water-boiler-warmer.php
item.itunes:subtitle: (VIDEO) Ancient Blooming Tea
item.itunes:summary:
I recently came across some bizarre tea called Blooming Display Tea that has a very strange and ancient brewing process. It has to be seen to be believed, so I made this little video demonstration to show you.
This cool tea is made up of tea leaves that are hand-wrapped, tightly packed and dried into a little tea ball. When steeped in hot water, the tea ball slowly unfurls its leaves into a magical blossoming flower right before your eyes. Its the perfect tea to serve when entertaining guests or for fun when you're bored like I was.
Stuff Featured in the Video:
Blooming Display Teas http://www.thegreenhead.com/2006/01/adagio-teas-blooming-display-teas.php
The Ultimate Coffee Cup http://www.thegreenhead.com/2007/06/ultimate-coffee-cup-by-david-pier.php

item.title: Episode 7 - Mercy is for the Weak!
item.itunes:author: Michael Kiely
item.description: In this late late midnight edition, everything is stirring, including a mouse! Topics discussed: Karate Kid memories, Rooibus Red Tea, Irish Cheese, Howard the Duck is underrated, a lesson on how to cook the amazing Artichoke, Mary drives her car off a cliff in a stunning artichoke truck mishap, a big special shout out and much much more.

item.title: Episode 6 - Total Random Awareness
item.itunes:author: Michael Kiely, Mary Carde
item.description: Do you ever get the strange occurrence of total random awareness? Are chicken omelettes just wrong? We answer some of the greatest philosophical questions ever and discuss why there's no country for foreign Oscars. All of this and more, as you listen in once again to this fascinating, yet neverending podcast already in progress.

item.title: Episode 4 - Mary, Mary, Quite Contrary
item.itunes:author: Michael Kiely, Mary Carde
item.description: Today's episode unleashes a new co-host, Mary, and topical discussions about new titles, John Leguizamo, a Donkey Kong movie, puking in a movie theater, twelve, General Zod, R-rated movies we saw as kids, men who smoke Virginia Slims and much much more. Finally, I have a co-host and together we are figuring out this new world of podcasting out day by day.

item.title: (VIDEO) Episode 2 - All-in-One Thanksgiving Leftover Pie
item.itunes:author: Michael Kiely, Alton Morris
item.description: Join host Alton Morris of TheGreenHead.com as he demonstrates how to make a soon to be world famous All-in-One Thanksgiving Leftover Pie. This incredibly cool pie has all the leftovers you love from a traditional Thanksgiving dinner, all baked into one single pie. Part 1 of 2 of TheGreenHead.com Show - Super Holiday Special!
item.itunes:subtitle: (VIDEO) Episode 2 - All-in-One Thanksgiving Leftover Pie

item.title: (VIDEO) Episode 1 - Scary Pumpkin Soup Served in Mini Pumpkins!
item.itunes:author: Michael Kiely, Alton Morris
item.description: Discover how to make scary pumpkin soup served in mini pumpkins with host Alton Morris of TheGreenHead.com and his trusty box of wine. Also learn if wine mixes with tequila, if carving a pumpkin with scissors is sometimes the best solution and if you actually taste cursed pumpkin soup, will you become what you eat? All of this and more in the scariest homemade DIY recipe you have ever seen!
item.itunes:subtitle: (VIDEO) Episode 1 - Scary Pumpkin Soup Served in Mini Pumpkins!
item.itunes:summary: Discover how to make scary pumpkin soup served in mini pumpkins with host Alton Morris of TheGreenHead.com and his trusty box of wine. All of this and more in the scariest homemade DIY recipe you have ever seen!
